intro: Sciadotenia sprucei, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to eastern Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant features velvety, dark green leaves and produces showy, tubular flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white. Sciadotenia sprucei thrives in humid, well-drained soil and requires indirect light for optimal growth. It is a popular ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and long-lasting blooms.
